[`PluginSettingTab`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PluginSettingTab.md)

## PluginSettingTab class

Provides a unified interface for users to configure the plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export abstract class PluginSettingTab extends SettingTab 
```
**Extends:** [`SettingTab`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/SettingTab.md)
